prop.name: arrivalAirport
prop.desc: The airport where the flight terminates.

prop.name: provider
prop.desc: The service provider, service operator, or service performer; the goods producer. Another party (a seller) may offer those services or goods on behalf of the provider. A provider may also serve as the seller.

prop.name: arrivalGate
prop.desc: Identifier of the flight's arrival gate.

prop.name: flightNumber
prop.desc: The unique identifier for a flight including the airline IATA code. For example, if describing United flight 110, where the IATA code for United is 'UA', the flightNumber is 'UA110'.

prop.name: carrier
prop.desc: 'carrier' is an out-dated term indicating the 'provider' for parcel delivery and flights.

prop.name: boardingPolicy
prop.desc: The type of boarding policy used by the airline (e.g. zone-based or group-based).

prop.name: seller
prop.desc: An entity which offers (sells / leases / lends / loans) the services / goods.  A seller may also be a provider.

prop.name: webCheckinTime
prop.desc: The time when a passenger can check into the flight online.

prop.name: mealService
prop.desc: Description of the meals that will be provided or available for purchase.

prop.name: departureGate
prop.desc: Identifier of the flight's departure gate.

prop.name: departureTerminal
prop.desc: Identifier of the flight's departure terminal.

prop.name: estimatedFlightDuration
prop.desc: The estimated time the flight will take.

prop.name: arrivalTerminal
prop.desc: Identifier of the flight's arrival terminal.

prop.name: departureAirport
prop.desc: The airport where the flight originates.
